question: David Stern who passed away recently was the Commissioner of which famous Sports league?
explanation: A famous figure among the basketball Community David Stern passed away recently. He served as the Commissioner of National Basketball Association, NBA from 1984 to 2014. He also made a record of being the longest serving Commissioner of a major league. He played a crucial role in broadening the scope of NBA in the international arena and making it popular and successful.  The Women\'s National Basketball Association was founded under his leadership.
